import socket

IP = "PC_IP_ADDRESS"  # replace with your PC's IP
PORT = 5005

sock = socket.socket(socket.AF_INET, socket.SOCK_DGRAM)

seed = input("Enter seed (8 hex digits): ")  # e.g. "12AB34CD"
sock.sendto(seed.encode(), (IP, PORT))

key, _ = sock.recvfrom(1024)
print("Received Key:", key.decode())
